Name: opiate dependence
Definition: A drug dependence that involves the continued use of opiate drugs despite despite problems related to use of the substance.

Name: barbiturate dependence
Definition: A drug dependence that involves the continued use of barbiturates despite problems related to use of the substance.

Name: cocaine dependence
Definition: A drug dependence that is a psychological dependency on the regular use of cocaine.

Name: hallucinogen dependence
Definition: A drug dependence that involves the continued use of hallucinogenic drugs despite problems related to use of the substance.
